entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
